FetchLaterResult.summary: NOTE Experimental The FetchLaterResult interface of the Fetch API is returned by the method after a deferred fetch has been created.

remarks.para: It contains a single activated property that indicates whether the deferred request has been sent out or not.
After a successful sending, the whole response is ignored — including body and headers — so the response of the deferred fetch is never returned to the FetchLaterResult interface.

FetchLaterResultActivated.summary: NOTE Experimental The activated read-only property of the interface returns a boolean specifying whether the deferred fetch has been sent.
